Portal 2 is a fantastic game with a highly developed storyline and beautiful graphics (especially for 2011). Be aware before buying that the main story will last you somewhere in the ballpark of ~10 hours, but there's infinite playability with the community test chambers. The one thing I have to say is that I wish GLaDOS was more talkative as a potato. 10/10 would buy again.

WHO WANTS MOOOAARR???!!!

Okay, so. If you don't know what portal 2 is, and the steam videos haven't given you enough insight, here's what it is. You know those fun first person puzzle solving games. Yeah, the ones that don't copy other ones and have its own unique mechanic that stands out. Portals is the best. Here's how it works. You shoot a portal on the ground, you shoot a portal on the roof, you fall into the one on the ground and come out of the one on the roof (portals aren't placed just on the floor and roof). This is used SO RIDUCULOUSLY WELL throught THE ENTITRE GAME. Even if the graphics aren't up there with modern games, who gives a darn with this gameplay. And guess what, this is where it gets insane. THEY ADDED A STINKING LEVEL CREATOR. So you know what that means. Yes, INFINITE LEVELS. Also, when a new game comes out and it gets smothered in 10/10, best game ever, astonashing. But everyone knows it doesn't deserve those, because it just looks fancy *cough the order 1886*. Portal is like the opposite of *cough the order 1886*, it doesn't look super insanely well (still, looks good enough to be a playable game) but it actually has hard puzzles, interesting mechanics, a story, fun co op, infinite levels, and a campaign that took me months to beat. Seriously, every time i beat a hard puzzle that took days to beat, i got an even harder on afterwards (for a puzzle game, thats a good thing).
[h1] [i] [b] When life gives you lemons, make lemonade [/b] [/i] [/h1]
This. Game. Defines. Life... A mind fuck

AMAZING GAME!!! WORTH EVERY CENT!!!! (I got it for $3 during a sale :D 80% off)

I feel like you don't need to play the first game, but you need to find out a bit about the ending of Portal 1, but this is my opinion and you should probably get the first game

Desventajas: 
 - Ni la historia principal ni el cooperativo duran mucho
 - Esta conectado en cierta forma con el 1 pero no se explica lo que paso entre los dos

Ventajas:
 - Puedes divertirte con tus amigos en el cooperativo (Llega a ser muy divertido)
 - Hay muchos momentos graciosos en la historia, secretos, zonas ocultas, personajes graciosos durante todo el juego, 
 - Vale la pena jugarlo e inclusive volverlo a jugar ya sea para intentar hacerlo más rapido o buscar todas las zonas ocultas u obtener todos los logros.

El juego no es de los mejores que existen pero es entretenido en la historia y aún más el cooperativo hablando con amigos, vale la pena comprarlo y si lo encuentras en oferta tienes que comprarlo y lo más seguro es que minimo te va a dar gracia una cosa en el juego
Um dos melhores jogos que eu joguei.

Portal 2 is invigorating extension of the wildly popular Portal franchise.  Portal 2's extensive storyline and dark humor make it one of the best games of the decade, and a must play for all serious gamers.  Between the witty GLADOS and Cave Johnson, this game is sure to entertain for generations.

I absolutley loved portal 2. The story was great and humorous, and the puzzles were really interesting. When I finished the story there was still a lot to do such as the co op campiagin and the workshop puzzles. I'd say you may still want to pick it up on sale though, since it seems to go on sale quite often.

Listen, you like a phycho Robot trying to kill you by testing a mind games? Or an huge facility abandoned, with tons of cool science features? Then go ahead Play Portal Series.

相比一代，二代的玩法充实了很多，[spoiler]  这当然是废话，否则阀门就太没有上进心了，	[/spoiler]  而且呢，剧情方面还是挺有趣，虽然挺简单的，不过如果仔细听背景的声音的话，能够了解到很多关于光圈科技的设定，包括历史什么的，以及GLADOS的起源等等。通关过后，也就愈发喜欢GLAdos了，伴随着最后的音乐，真的有被感动到。

至于解谜方面来说，在进入地下后，好像就变成了一个寻找白墙的游戏了，很多时候是真的找不到白墙开传送门啊。但是一旦找到了白墙，也就不用怎么思考了，个人觉得这是一个比较失败的地方。由于增加了许多新的装置，也就使得解谜方式变得更加多样和有趣。

至于合作关卡，由于没有什么基友一起玩，玩的也比较少，也就不太好评价了。不过就玩过的一小段时间来说，还是挺有趣的，[spoiler] 最重要的是可以互相坑啊。	[/spoiler]
事先说一句：这游戏太烧脑了！游戏整体很不错，但是解密实在是太费脑了。我玩到第二章已经卡关了，我已经意识到了我智商余额不足了。

A somewhat half hearted attempt by valve to capture the Candy Crush crowd, Portal 2 exemplifies the desperation to capture this growing mobile phone audience. In exchange for Candy Crush's brilliant and vibrant color, the laboratories of Aperture Science are a lugubrious, drab greyish white. The charm that King's mobile title exudes at every corner is lacking in Valve's poor imitation. The illustrious guide, Mr. Toffee, whose physiognomy personifies joy is discarded in exchange for a heartless, inhuman machine. The delightful player character, Tiffi, is replaced by a voiceless, utterly uninteresting test subject. With no character development whatsoever, Portal 2 fails to make the player become invested in the outcome of the characters, one of the main reasons Candy Crush was so well received. The game mechanics of Portal 2 have been watered down in order to appeal to toddlers. The once mentally intensive act of matching varieties of candy has been replaced with generating portals to the end of the levels. No skill is required as one may just create a portal at any moment to the end of the game. Overall Valve's attempt to cash in on the success of puzzle games lacks all that made Candy Crush so fantastic, including the ability to play on the go. Why a puzzle game such as this lacks mobile phone functionality is an enigma to me.

Overall I give this game a 2/10.
As others have suggested, play Candy Crush instead.

Portal 2 is a really good comibnation of FPS / Puzzle Game.

Second part of a really nice series of puzzle games.
And yes the Portal gun is back again only with a lot of new challanges to beat.
It's not a basic and boring puzzle game when you go to stage one until you clear the game.
Portal manage to add a really nice story mode to it so the game is fun big adventure to play.
Only between stages things happen that makes it challaging and fun to play this game and let you keep on playing.
I cleared the game / story mode around the 9 hours so it's not a really big game.
What makes it fun you can now play with your buddy co-op to do all the extra missions that complete the main sotry mode.

Portal 2 is a really good game and you need to try if you love this genre.
I give this game a 9/10.

Играл раньше в эту игру,просто класс.

The first game is amazing, yet this second game takes an already cool concept, and expands on it. Making it even better.

The soundtrack is amazing. The voice acting is even better. The gameplay...how the puzzles just sort of, lead you in the right direction and ramp up in difficulty very smoothly. So nice.

I had fun messing around with the level editor too. It helped me to understand the phsyics of the game better, and enjoy the game a lot more. To see, in a way, how it was made.

Go play it, please. It's so much fun.

One of the best puzzle games ever that you can play with a coop mode.

+FPS解密类游戏，有良好3D想象能力会玩的很好。
+相当新颖的模式，画面和配乐都很到位。
+关卡不枯燥，多人模式有一定程度的合作要求。

-可能会发生3D眩晕的情况，如果有这一情况发生，建议休息一段时间后继续游玩。
-并不是一个冲进度的游戏，更建议静下心慢慢体验。

現在想想當時確實是有點過分急躁了
